name: little Tooth
description:
Welcome, welcome, enter the world of the Tooth Fairy who collects children's teeth to borrow their precious memories.

But what happens when the Tooth Fairy wakes up and realizes that all her collected teeth were gone?

Help the Tooth Fairy collect all the precious teeth, talk to the inhabitants, explore the wondrous, enchanted world and complete tasks to collect piece by piece all the teeth.

Controls Move: Interaction: Credit

- Music and SFX-Sounds  made by Epidemic Sounds/ edit with Fmod Studio

- Made with Unity

- 3D Assets made in Blender

special thanks to: 

Sateklon - itch.io

- download the zip-file

- unpack the file

- have fun ~
